predicate.note: Frames file for 'sanitize' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

example.name: active
example.text: Many larger egg producers are also egg processors, who [*T*-1] crack, inspect, and sanitize billions of eggs, turning them into powdered, liquified or frozen egg products.
example.arg: turning them into powdered, liquified or frozen egg products

example.name: passive
example.text: The Egg King carries written instructions to break only high-grade eggs that [*T*-3] have been properly sanitized [*-1] and, as an added precaution, to use the eggs only in products that will be cooked enough to kill bacteria.
